channel.title: Akatsuki Village: A minecraft superpower
channel.description:
Recently, the Akatsuki village has been growing. I figured, we needed to grow upwards, not outwards. And here we are with what I believe is the biggest building in the land of minecraft. It is a skyscraper, which on each floor will be used for business. Currently unfinished.
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/1115iyt.png[/img]
More people need to move into us, as our power is growing. Here is a tour of our great village.
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/29q1ahd.png[/img] Iron Gate Entry, works with redstone
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/egpcac.png[/img] Watchtower, used to protect against raids.
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2i76yp3.png[/img] Main Castle
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/264m3h3.png[/img] Inside the Castle
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2afehc4.png[/img] Outside Commercial District
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/68u8w7.png[/img] Town square, part of commercial district
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/eqqlvs.png[/img] More commercial district
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/sg3414.png[/img] My place :D
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2hpt47p.png[/img] Duel ring
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/15aec2.png[/img] Housing district
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/ny7oqx.png[/img] Apartment roof pool & hot tub
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/dwun7t.png[/img] Off the diving board!
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/m7xtz5.png[/img] City view at night
